definition: to be saved from/to be spared (something)
to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited

sentences.english: So they are still capable of drawing back from a fratricidal war.
sentences.chinese: 所以他們仍有能力免於經歷這場自相殘殺。
樹活下來了，他也倖免於難。

sentences.english: Jarod yanked his mount aside just in time to avoid an agonizing death.
sentences.chinese: 迦洛德猛拉他坐騎跑到一邊才免於痛苦的死去。

sentences.english: This is a misunderstanding of maturity. You will never outgrow temptation.
sentences.chinese: 這是對成熟的誤解，因你永遠不能免於試探。

sentences.english: The bankruptcy of Lehman might have been avoided but what would have happened to the asset super-bubble?
sentences.chinese: 雷曼或許會免於破產，但資產超級泡沫會怎樣？

sentences.english: eg: But regular cleaning will keep the metal from rusting.
sentences.chinese: 但定期的清潔能使金屬免於生鏽。

sentences.english: Iceland was able to secure an emergency loan from Russia.
sentences.chinese: 最後賴於俄國的緊急貸款，冰島免於罹難。

sentences.english: The goal seems to be to defend the royal family from criticism.
sentences.chinese: 該法案的目的似乎是保衛王室，使之免於批評。

sentences.english: People drink realgar wine to protect themselves from illness.
sentences.chinese: 人們喝雄黃侍者護本身免於害病。

sentences.english: Being minimumally familiar with boxing and muaythai may save your skin someday.
sentences.chinese: 稍微熟悉一下拳擊和泰拳可能會在某天讓你免於捱揍。

sentences.english: But at least I could protect him from even more psychological harm.
sentences.chinese: 但是至少我可以讓他免於受到更多的心理傷害。

sentences.english: Certain commodities are not presently considered egg products and are exempt from this law.
sentences.chinese: 目前一些商品還不認爲是蛋製品並且免於法律的限定。

sentences.english: Get back to the bigger picture, which is protecting yourself from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 回到更高的一個層面來，是什麼在保護你免於日曬？

sentences.english: The train went off the rails and fell into the vally, killing everyone on board.
sentences.chinese: 火車出了軌，掉到峽谷下，車上無一人倖免於難。

sentences.english: They also object to giving the president and his family any immunity from prosecution.
sentences.chinese: 他們還拒絕給予總統及其家人任何免於起訴的特權。

sentences.english: At least she gets to keep her colon and is cancer-free.
sentences.chinese: 至少要保證她的結腸並免於癌症。

definition: unfettered and beyond the law (idiom); evading retribution/getting away with it (e.g. crimes)/still at large
to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
to be on guard/wariness/to guard against/preventive
to try/to make an attempt/to think of a way (to accomplish sth)
